content: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_CoinDear all, In the previous post, I introduced a new blockchain project called CORE. I invested in it, so I want to talk more about it and read your comments. tnx Please download and read the CORE whitepaper. So tell your general opinion: https://coremultichain.com/docs/core-paper.pdfI have purchased CMCX (native token of the CORE MultiChain) to invest in this project. Of course,now CMCX is a token (https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/core-multichain/ ), But in the Q1 2023 , the blockchain project will be launched and CMCX will be converted into coin.Guys, the DejaVu TestNet of the CORE project is available to the public, please check ithttps://dejavu-testnet.coremultichain.com/Blockchain 3.0 200 Sharding+50,000 TPS3 Sec Block Time 10 Sec Tx Finality +4000 Nodes in the first year Replay me to receive CMCX coins and have a transaction experience on DejaVuTestNet

comments.author: lucasjansen1980
comments.created_time: March 01, 2023, 01:49:05 PMLast edit: June 09, 2023, 10:44:58 AM by lucasjansen1980
comments.body: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_CoinTo add the CORE MultiChain’s Deja-Vu TestNet network to your wallets, please follow the below steps:For Metamask Wallet users:1. Go to the Explorer's website (https://dejavu-testnet.coremultichain.com/);2. Open the sidebar menu (top right of the page);3. Click on “Add" button.*You can also enter the network configuration details manually to your Metamask wallet, using the following information:Network Name: CORE Multichain Deja vu TestNetNew RPC URL:https://testnet-rpc.coremultichain.net/Chain ID:2122Currency symbol:CMCXBlock explorer URL:https://dejavu-testnet.coremultichain.com/==========================For CORE Wallet users:0. download the new version of CORE-MultiChain wallet: https://wallet.coremultichain.com 1. In Home Page, click on the “Add Token" button;2. scroll down and select “CORE MultiChain Testnet” and click on “Add Token”.
